title: Heera & Manikyam Gala Haaram - Timeless Bridal Statement
materials: Ruby (Manikyam) Cabochons of AAA quality. Meticulously handcrafted with a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Inspired by traditional Telugu bridal necklaces, this Gala Haaram features a captivating design with Polki diamonds arranged in intricate floral patterns, complemented by vibrant ruby cabochons. The Polki setting is designed to maximize the diamonds' natural sparkle. The 'kundan' work along the edges further enhances its rich aesthetic.
colors: Ruby (deep red). The combination of gold and rubies is a classic South Indian bridal color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Perfectly complements traditional silk sarees like Kanjeevaram or Banarasi.
description: A true heirloom piece, this Gala Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry. The Polki diamonds and ruby cabochons are carefully selected for their exceptional quality and brilliance. The exquisite craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and durability. Makes a powerful statement of elegance and tradition.
